00026 #ifndef NOISEBUILDERS_H
00027 #define NOISEBUILDERS_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePrerequisites.h"
00030 #include "NoisePipelineJobs.h"
00031 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00032 
00033 namespace noisepp
00034 {
00035 namespace utils
00036 {
00037 
00040 class BuilderCallback
00041 {
00042         private:
00043                 int cur;
00044 
00045         public:
00047                 BuilderCallback () : cur(0)
00048                 {}
00050                 void callback ()
00051                 {
00052                         progress(++cur);
00053                 }
00055                 void reset ()
00056                 {
00057                         cur = 0;
00058                 }
00060                 virtual void progress (int cur) = 0;
00062                 virtual ~BuilderCallback ()
00063                 {}
00064 };
00065 
00071 class Builder
00072 {
00073         protected:
00075                 Real *mDest;
00077                 int mWidth;
00079                 int mHeight;
00081                 Module *mModule;
00082 
00084                 void checkParameters ();
00085 
00087                 BuilderCallback *mCallback;
00088 
00089         public:
00091                 Builder ();
00095                 void setSize (int width, int height);
00097                 void setDestination (Real *dest);
00099                 void setModule (Module *module);
00101                 inline void setModule (Module &module)
00102                 {
00103                         setModule (&module);
00104                 }
00106                 void setCallback (BuilderCallback *callback);
00108                 virtual void build () = 0;
00110                 virtual int getProgressMaximum () const = 0;
00112                 virtual ~Builder ();
00113 };
00114 
00116 class PlaneBuilder2D : public Builder
00117 {
00118         private:
00119                 Real mLowerBoundX, mLowerBoundY;
00120                 Real mUpperBoundX, mUpperBoundY;
00121                 bool mSeamless;
00122 
00123         public:
00125                 PlaneBuilder2D ();
00127                 void build (Pipeline2D *pipeline, PipelineElement2D *element);
00129                 virtual void build ();
00131                 int getProgressMaximum () const;
00132 
00138                 void setBounds (Real lowerBoundX, Real lowerBoundY, Real upperBoundX, Real upperBoundY);
00140                 Real getLowerBoundX () const;
00142                 Real getLowerBoundY () const;
00144                 Real getUpperBoundX () const;
00146                 Real getUpperBoundY () const;
00148                 void setSeamless (bool v=true);
00150                 bool isSeamless () const;
00151 };
00152 
00153 };
00154 };
00155 
00156 #endif // NOISEBUILDERS_H
